{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}

-- | Minimal implementations of relmaps

module Koshucode.Baala.Minimal.Relmap.Implement
( minimalRelmaps
-- * Operand parser
, relmaps
, relmapParsers
-- * Relmap constructor
, relmapJoint
, relmapRename
, relmapSource
) where
import Koshucode.Baala.Base.Data
import Koshucode.Baala.Base.Struct
import Koshucode.Baala.Base.Prelude.Abort
import Koshucode.Baala.Minimal.Relmap.Confl
import Koshucode.Baala.Minimal.Relmap.Unary
import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.Kit as Kit
import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.Syntax as Syn

-- | Minimal implementations of relmaps
minimalRelmaps :: (Ord v) => [RelmapImplement v]
minimalRelmaps = relmaps relmapParsers
    -- Relmap operators in alphabetical order
    [ ("| -"         , makeJoint  , ["RELMAP | RELMAP"])
    , ("cut /P"      , makeCut    , ["cut /NAME ..."])
    , ("join R"      , makeJoin   , ["join RELMAP ...",
                                     "join RELMAP ... -share /NAME ..."])
    , ("meet R"      , makeMeet   , ["meet RELMAP ...",
                                     "meet RELMAP ... -share /NAME ..."])
    , ("pick /P"     , makePick   , ["pick /NAME ..."])
    , ("reldee -"    , makeReldee , ["reldee"])
    , ("reldum -"    , makeReldum , ["reldum"])
    , ("rename /N/P" , makeRename , ["rename /NEW /OLD ..."])
    , ("source SRC"  , makeSource , ["source SIGN /NAME ..."])
    ]

makeJoint :: ConsFullRelmap v
makeJoint _ _ subs = Right $ relmapJoint subs

makeReldee, makeReldum :: ConsFullRelmap v
makeReldee = relcon "reldee" reldee
makeReldum = relcon "reldee" reldum

relcon :: String -> Rel v -> ConsFullRelmap v
relcon n r _ _ _ = Right $ RelmapConst n r

makeCut :: (Ord v) => ConsFullRelmap v
makeCut n args _ = do
      term <- args <!!> "term"
      ns   <- Syn.termNames term
      Right $ Kit.calc n (project Kit.drop ns) []

makeJoin :: (Ord v) => ConsFullRelmap v
makeJoin _ _ subs = do
  let (r:_) = subs
  Right $ join r

makeMeet :: (Ord v) => ConsFullRelmap v
makeMeet _ _ subs = do
  let (r:_) = subs
  Right $ meet r

makePick :: (Ord v) => ConsFullRelmap v
makePick n args _ = do
      term <- args <!!> "term"
      ns   <- Syn.termNames term
      Right $ Kit.calc n (project Kit.take ns) []

makeRename :: ConsFullRelmap v
makeRename _ args _ = do
  term <- args <!!> "term"
  np   <- Syn.termNamePairs term
  Right $ relmapRename np

makeSource :: ConsFullRelmap v
makeSource _ args _ = do
  [Syn.Bloom (Syn.Word _ sign)] <- args <!!> "sign"
  term <- args <!!> "term"
  ns   <- Syn.termNames term
  Right $ relmapSource sign ns



-- ---------------------- Operand parser

relmaps
  :: [(String, RelmapParser)]
  -> [(String, ConsFullRelmap v, [String])]
  -> [RelmapImplement v]
relmaps parsers = map f where
    f (spec, full, usage) =
        let [operator, pattern] = words spec
            Just parser = lookup pattern parsers
        in RelmapImplement operator parser full usage

relmapParsers :: [(String, RelmapParser)]
relmapParsers =
    [ ("-"     , terms)
    , ("/N/P"  , terms)
    , ("/P"    , terms)
    , ("R"     , rels)
    , ("SRC"   , src)
    ] where

    terms :: RelmapParser
    terms xs = [("term", xs)]

    rels :: RelmapParser
    rels xs = [("relmap", xs)]

    src :: RelmapParser
    src (s:xs) = [("sign", [s]), ("term", xs)]
    src _      = []



-- ----------------------  Constructors

-- | Connect relmaps
relmapJoint :: [Relmap v] -> (Relmap v)
relmapJoint []     = RelmapConst "reldee" reldee
relmapJoint [m]    = m
relmapJoint (m:ms) = let m' = relmapJoint ms
                     in RelmapJoint m m'

-- | Rename term names
relmapRename :: [(String, String)] -> (Relmap v)
relmapRename np = Kit.calc "rename" (renameNP np) []

-- | Retrieve relation from dataset
relmapSource :: String -> [String] -> (Relmap v)
relmapSource sign ns = RelmapSource sign ns
